patterns.solution: Install missing dependency with pip install
patterns.prevention: Check requirements.txt and ensure all dependencies are installed

patterns.pattern: Coverage failure: total of .* is less than fail-under=100
patterns.solution: Add tests for uncovered code paths
patterns.prevention: Write tests alongside code, use TDD approach

patterns.solution: Run database migrations: alembic upgrade head
patterns.prevention: Always run migrations after pulling changes
Ensure Redis is running before starting application

note: This file tracks errors and their solutions for automatic learning
